title: Chung Chia Matthew
description:
The Chung Chia language, called Zhongjia in Pinyin is the language of the BuYei (Bouyei) people of Guizhou Province in China.
Gospel of Matthew: It was published as "Fu in Ma-tai" and the inside cover said "Chung Chia Vernacular Gospel of Mattew". It was published by the British and Foreign Bible Society in Shanghai in 1904.

language.name: Bouyei
language.area: Guizhou-Yunnan plateau, mainly Buyi-Miao and Miao-Dong autonomous prefectures, Zhenning and Guanling counties, south and southwest Guizhou; Yunnan Province, Luoping County; Sichuan Province, Ningnan and Huidong counties. Also in France, United States, Viet Nam.
